meanings.definition: To fasten a surcingle around (an animal)
meanings.sent1: The farmer surcingled the horse before the ride.
meanings.sent2: She always surcingled the saddle securely before mounting.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous goat managed to escape even when surcingled tightly.
meanings.sent4: His determination surcingled him with strength to face the challenge.
meanings.sent5: The image of the surcingled horse stayed in her mind as a symbol of preparation.

meanings.definition: Having a surcingle around the body
meanings.sent1: The surcingled pony trotted gracefully around the ring.
meanings.sent2: The surcingled dog seemed comfortable during the training session.
meanings.sent3: The surcingled cat looked like a tiny warrior ready for battle.
meanings.sent4: The surcingled waistcoat added a touch of elegance to his outfit.
meanings.sent5: The surcingled blanket kept her warm on the chilly evening.
